name: Hot Hasty Desert Dash (WIP)
description:
Ah yes, it's a lovely day in desert paradise. The grass wavers with the breeze as the clouds gingerly pass overhead. It's perfect, just - HEY WOAH, DON'T STEP ON THE SAND!!! OWCH ACH OOCH YEOOWWCH

...Game #1 for game a week 2022, with this week's theme being 10 seconds or less!
